# MTLCompareFunction.never

**Case**

A new value never passes the comparison test.

## Declaration

```swift
case never
```

## Related Documentation

- **Metal Shading Language Guide**
- **Metal Programming Guide**

## Compare function options

- **MTLCompareFunction.less**: A new value passes the comparison test if it is less than the existing value.
- **MTLCompareFunction.equal**: A new value passes the comparison test if it is equal to the existing value.
- **MTLCompareFunction.lessEqual**: A new value passes the comparison test if it is less than or equal to the existing value.
- **MTLCompareFunction.greater**: A new value passes the comparison test if it is greater than the existing value.
- **MTLCompareFunction.notEqual**: A new value passes the comparison test if it is not equal to the existing value.
- **MTLCompareFunction.greaterEqual**: A new value passes the comparison test if it is greater than or equal to the existing value.
- **MTLCompareFunction.always**: A new value always passes the comparison test.
